p: Plant extracts containing tannins, saponins, and other substances have become the most interesting subject of molluscicidal research in recent decades [ 28]. There are many plant species rich in saponins, but their molluscicidal effects are different. Among these, Q. saponaria, Camellia oleifera, C. sasanqua, Gleditsia amorphoides, Bidens pilosa, Saponaria officinalis, Pulsatilla chinensis, and Sapindus mukorossi are the most investigated plant species that have molluscicidal properties [ 13, 25, 29, 30, 31, 32, 33].
